title: Brazil : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: In general Number of users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Number of users in millions, about 91.5 was reported at Year 2023
Minimum Number of users in millions about 75.6 was reached at Year 2018
